郹字的基本解释

郹
jú
〔郹阳〕古邑名，中国春秋时属蔡，在今河南省新蔡县境。

郹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jú］
［《廣韻》古闃切，入錫，見。］
(1)春秋蔡邑。在今河南省新蔡县境。
(2)春秋卫地。在今山东省巨野县西南。

郹字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郹； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1274第02
【廣韻】古覓切【集韻】關闃切，?音湨。【說文】蔡邑也。引《左傳·昭十九年》楚子之在蔡也，郹陽封人之女奔。之◎按《左傳》今本俱作郥。俗譌作鄓，非。

郹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
郹字的起名意思

暂无。

Yun
Basic explanation of words
Yun
jú
[Yun Yang] The name of the ancient town, which belonged to Cai in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, was located in Xincai County, Henan Province.
Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jú］
["Guangyun" Gu Xie cut into tin, see. ]
(1) Spring and Autumn Caiyi. In today's Xincai County, Henan Province.
(2) Spring and Autumn Guards. In the southwest of today's Juye County, Shandong Province.
Yun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郹; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 1274 02
[Guangyun] Gu Miqie [Jiyun] Guan Xieqie,? Yin Tan. [Said the text] Cai Yi also. Quoting from "Zuo Zhun Nineteen Years of Zhao", Chu Zizhi was in Cai Ye, and the daughter of Yun Yang ran. Of ◎ Press "Zuo Zhuan" to write today. The vulgar 譌 is enthalpy, non-.
